attributes.review: i don’t approve of this app. my Child found my phone and went onto it, and there was an ad for a porn website!! he clicked on it and now I have to explain what that is. This app is super laggy and unreliable. my respect for Trump has gone down lower than it was before. this app is a disgrace.
attributes.title: horrible.

attributes.review: They wanted me to give 5 stars ✨✨, but I believe that all stars matter.🌈🌸🦋 People need to recognize that there  are more stars then the 5 that  some people believe are superior.🌊🌊❄️🌈 II think all stars are equal and for his reason I am giving a one star rating  to represent to folks who think all stars should be seen as one.✨🌸🍀🌈

attributes.title: App

attributes.review:
I recently downloaded this app so I can support my president but found out you had to pay to find where trumps rally was gonna be!! I don’t have much income due to the coronavirus and it was $20, which I though was highway robbery 

Please don’t waste your money and please save it for better items
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: I was completely disappointed with this app. I downloaded it to get some understanding from out prez and his apology statements but all of it is just FAKE NEWZ. This is a terrible app please do don’t download it and write another review on this app about how bad it is. They should just take it down altogether. 😬✊
attributes.title: I think my dog got ran over

attributes.review: The entire app just doesn’t work as a whole. To be completely frank, it’s just trash honestly. I wish it worked and functioned better than it did but I’m now debating whether to just delete it. One star but I would’ve rated it less if I could. Do better.
attributes.title: Doesn’t work.
